channel.title: Some Useful Info On #452
channel.description:
im not sure whether this is #452 but I think it is:
i have been looking through the client to make it connect to my server, and have found out some minor details... Im not 100% sure whether they are correct but I think they are.
when using a text inside the client eg
[code] ("http://www.runescape.com") [/code]
jagex has replaced certain characters with corresponding values : -
)2 = , )3 = . )4 = /
so the same text in the client looks like this
[code] ("http:)4)4www)3runescape)3com") [/code]
or another example
[code] ("Loading Server)2 Please Wait)3)3)3") [/code] I have also found out that in the new client, the cache directorys and file handling in Class32. also the image behind the login menu is In Class60 and Ability maybe to change the font in Class73
I hope some people find this useful
I will keep everyone posted on my findings.
- Coyle

item.title: Some Useful Info On #452
item.dc:creator: @kmb Kmb
item.description:
@kmb wrote:

No more e-penis fights, please and thank you.

As frank said, as long as you are learning, it is a good thing.

Read full topic

ignore what psb says. as long as you are learning, it is a good thing
